reviewTitle: Top place, cosy environment warm people😉
review_details: Having the best gin tonic at Betty Bijoux bar of Flandria hotel. The presentation and the taste are PERFECT!Colourfull and with cosideration to the environment(no plastic)Totally a place to visit in Ghent
HCMR scientists are cruising with F/V Panagia and captain Giorgos investigating #plastic #pollution at Zakunthos waters within the framework of the INTERREG-MED #PlasticBastersMPAs project
